q1: Do Germany use a Sport Psychologist with the national team?
a1: Yes Germany have lots of background staff, maybe they need new ones because Mexico beat them !
a2: Mexico is a solid team, the upset this year was so fun to watch
a3: Joachim Low is the coach for Germany.
q4: How long has he been coach?
a4: Joachim Low has been the German coach since 2006.
